name: Love from the Inside Wellness Society
legal: Non for Profit NGO and Charity Organization
goal: “Love From The Inside”  means to truly love ourselves, it requires that we start within.  It’s a journey worth taking, that will cultivate meaningful relationships and connection.   In healing ourselves, we will profoundly change our lives, community and the world for the better.
interests: Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Registered and validated by the EU Commission to be one of the few Canadian NGO to participate in EU Projects and Research. Consult Funding and Tenders EU website for our registration and PIC number.
